urls.description: What are we doing to make our ports and container terminals more sustainable?💚 Join Lene Bjorn Serpa, Head of Corporate Sustainability & ESG at Maersk and Sahar Rashidbeigi, Head of Decarbonisation at APM Terminals in a live discussion on how we are working towards climate neutral operations in our terminals 🏭 At the event our experts will touch upon our own key initiatives, industry trends as well as the main challenges in creating a greener logistics industry🌍 Anything else you want us to cover? Leave your questions in the comments below👇🏼 🗓 Mark your calendar on the 30th November at 2PM CET and sign up for the event! #maersk #apmterminals #sustainability #linkedinlive #decarb
urls.title: Maersk & APM Terminals decarbonisation journey | LinkedIn

1724723559778418725.text:
Join our experts in a live discussion to learn more about what we are doing to make our ports and container terminals more sustainable and the main challenges in creating a greener logistics industry💚

🗓 30th November at 2PM CET https://t.co/OwTdz9pEzP

#maersk #apmt #decarb
